original: Jungmarker, Martin Rudolf, läroverksadjunkt, Ronneby, f. 7/2/93 i Mjölby av postexp. Martin J. c. Ingrid Hjorth. G. m. Adèle Thörnberg. Barn: Sven f. 24. — Stud:ex. i Skara 11, fil. mag. i Upps. 15, provår v. Gbgs folksk:sem. 18. Vik. lektor i Sundsvall 17, vik. adj. v. Gbgs h. real 18-19, e. lär. i Landskrona 19-32, adj. i matem. o. fysik v. Ronneby samrealsk. sed. 32, rektors ’skrivbitr. 33-37, vik. rektor somr. 33-37. Jusélius, Erik Werner, tekn. dr, Göteborg, num-era Stockhoilm, f. 22/11/00 i Heilisingfors av prof. Axel Verner J. o. Gerda Anthoni. G. 34 m. Harriet Ni-kander. Barn: Harry f. 35, Peter 42. — Stud:ex. v. Nya sv. lärov. i Helsingfors 19, dipl. ing. v. tekn. högsk. i Hel|singfors 22,, fil. miag. v. Hel’sing’fors univ. 26, tékn. dr v. Züricbs tekn. högsik. 30. Asisist. v. tekn. högsk. i HeilsingfoTs 22-24, res. m. sttip. fr. tekn.- högsk. i Helsingfors t. Frankr. o. Schweiz 24-26. Konstr. v. ol. franska firmor 23-26 o. schweiziska 26-28. Start. A-B Morus i Hel|singfors s. gen :ag. f. A-B Atliais-Diesei i Sthlm o. Sabroe & Co. AS i Aarlius, Danm., 30, verkst. dir. där t. 44. Tekn. led. f. Sabroe Kyiind. A-B i Gbg 44-47. Verks-t. dir. f. Maskin A-B Olvin i Sthlm. Medi. av Börsklubt)en, Nyl-ändska yachtkl., Svenska kl. i He|lsingfors. Hobby: s-eigling. FFrK4lkl.
translated:
Jungmarker, Martin Rudolf, high school teacher, Ronneby, b. 7/2/93 in Mjölby to postman Martin J. and Ingrid Hjorth. Married to Adèle Thörnberg. Children: Sven b. 24. - Studied in Skara 11, graduated with a degree in philosophy at Uppsala University in 15, trial year at Gothenburg's people's school in 18. Substitute teacher in Sundsvall in 17, substitute assistant at Gothenburg's high school in 18-19, permanent teacher in Landskrona in 19-32, math and physics assistant at the Ronneby secondary school since 32, school principal's clerk 33-37, acting school principal in the summers of 33-37. 

Jusélius, Erik Werner, PhD in engineering, Gothenburg, formerly Stockholm, b. 22/11/00 in Helsinki, son of professor Axel Verner J. and Gerda Anthoni. Married to Harriet Nikander in 34. Children: Harry b. 35, Peter b. 42. - Graduated from Nya svenska läroverket in Helsinki in 19, graduated as a civil engineer from the Helsinki University of Technology in 22, earned a degree in philosophy from the University of Helsinki in 26, earned a PhD in engineering from the Zurich University of Technology in 30. Assistant at the Helsinki University of Technology in 22-24, resident with a scholarship from the Helsinki University of Technology in France and Switzerland in 24-26. Engineer for French firms from 23-26 and Swiss firms from 26-28. Started A-B Morus in Helsinki, served as managing director for A-B Atlas-Diesei in Stockholm and Sabroe & Co. AS in Aarlus, Denmark, in 30, and as technical director there until 44. Technical director for Sabroe Kyiind. A-B in Gothenburg from 44-47. Technical director for Maskin A-B Olvin in Stockholm. Member of the Börskluben, Nyländska Yachtklubben, and Svenska Kl. in Helsinki. Hobby: sailing.
